name: Dead Before Daylight
description:
Dead Before Daylight is a team based horror survival game. Play with your friends in real time multiplayer mode. There is one killer and 4 survivors left alone in the jungle.
Killer will come to hunt all the survivors and survivors have to escape the jungle by repairing the generators and eventually gets evade by the exit gates.

**Join the camp of 4 different survivors, each with their own unique role and set of abilities:

The survivors task is to repair the generators as fast a possible but be aware from the killer. Killer will chase and kill survivors by hanging them on the hook.
Survivors will get an heart beat alert when entering the killers terror radius.
Survivors have to plan their strategies and use their skills to evade from the killers deadly traps.

You won’t have a chance to build a shelter, and you won’t have seven nights—or even five nights—to survive. Creepy and scary online hide-and-seek game seek is about to begin! Try to stay alive and avoid a scary death!

Explore the environment and find a hiding place and heal your friends and team up with them to repair generators quickly. But be aware dont miss the skill check or else you will be exposed to the killer. Also the injured survivor will make more noise than the healtly so try to be stealthy when you are injured and tell your friends to heal you.


** Or maybe you’ve always dreamed of being a cause of nightmare and inspire the darkest fear, like a jason killer? is 13 is your favorite number? Then take the side of a bloodthirsty disgusting psychopath with the deadly weapon in hand.

The killers goal is very simple — search the survivors from the dark jungle and kill them by hanging them on the hook. Matches pit one killer against four survivors, but the killer is strong, with high movement speed and almost invincible. Let the evil awaken within you and force your victims to suffer in pain!!!


GAME FEATURES:

- Multiplayer based 4 survivors and 1 killer mode
- Realistic environment and 3rd person and 1st person mode
- Scary environments and horror sounds
- Strategy based game with unique skills


** Dead Before Daylight : Horror Multiplayer Survival game that will awake the goosebumps even among true fans of horror movies.
